title: Microwave AND Washer & Dryer Included
neighborhood: 3100 River Exchange Drive, Sandy Springs, GA
posting_body: ['Newly renovated cozy one bedroom apartment available now for move in!', 'This unit features a vaulted ceiling and beautiful stainless steel appliances.', 'In addition it includes a microwave and a washer & dryer in the unit!', 'At Retreat at River Park, our residents will find the perfect place to call home.', 'With our awesome amenities in each home and throughout our stunning community our apartments will accommodate every lifestyle.', 'Our exceptional apartments and spectacular amenities paired with our courteous team will surpass all of your expectations.', 'Enjoy the carefree lifestyle that you deserve!', 'Retreat at River Park Features:', '• Open Concept Floor Plans', '• Gas Range Stoves', '• Full Size Washer and Dryer in Units', '• Spacious Walk-In Closets', '• Fireplace*', '• Attached Garages*', '• Resident Clubhouse', '• Resort-Style Pool', '• 24 Hour Fitness Center', '• Bark Park', '• Doorstep Trash Valet', '• Car Care Center', '• Gated Community', '*Select units', 'Call us Today at', 'show contact info', 'for more information or', 'Visit our website at: <URL>/ to check our availability.', 'Professionally managed by GVA Property Management Equal Housing Opportunity.']
